actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim May 13, 1983, as "American Indian Day".

summary.text: Requests the President to designate May 13, 1982, as American Indian Day.
